scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run dist
scripts.package:linux-armv7: rm -rf out/bin && npm run pkg:linux-armv7 && ./scripts/package.sh linux-armv7 linux-arm
scripts.package:linux-arm64: rm -rf out/bin && npm run pkg:linux-arm64 && ./scripts/package.sh linux-arm64
scripts.package:linux-x64: rm -rf out/bin && npm run pkg:linux-x64 && ./scripts/package.sh linux-x64
scripts.package:macos-x64: rm -rf out/bin && npm run pkg:macos-x64 && ./scripts/package.sh macos-x64
scripts.package:node: rm -rf out/builds && rm -rf out/dist && mkdir -p out/dist && webpack && tar -czf 'out/dist/node.tgz' -C 'out/builds/node' .
scripts.pkg:linux-arm64: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='' && pkg --target node12-linux-arm64  dist/main.js -o ./out/bin/main-linux-arm64
scripts.pkg:linux-armv7: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='' && pkg --target node12-linux-armv7  dist/main.js -o ./out/bin/main-linux-armv7
scripts.pkg:linux-x64: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='' && pkg --target node12-linux-x64  dist/main.js -o ./out/bin/main-linux-x64
scripts.pkg:macos-x64: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='' && pkg --target node12-macos-x64  dist/main.js -o ./out/bin/main-macos-x64
